skills.$text: Strong knowledge of relational and dimensional database modeling, developing and debugging complex SQL and Oracle database configurations
Proficiency in Oracle 19c, SQL Server 2019, and SSIS with hands-on experience in SQL client tools, IDEs, and source code management tools

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design Oracle data warehouse components and associated ETLs via SSIS
Enable data analysts and managers to extract insights from the data ecosystem
Drive delivery of strategic and BAU initiatives by ensuring data warehouse components are reliable, efficient, and flexible/adaptable
Support production jobs, troubleshoot application issues, and guide users through the data warehouse systems

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent (Master's preferred)
Database certifications in Oracle and/or SQL Server
